messages: Use WASD or arrow keys to move
So, you see the green circle? In the middle?
The circle is always greener on the other side
When you try a puzzle game, but get stuck on level 1
Press enter or space to reset
Press enter or space to reset
Press enter or space to reset
Press backspace to go back to main menu
Just need to touch the middle of the circles
The blue field can change the direction
The timer also resets when you try again
Must use the walls to group up I guess
So one goes strait, and one goes down
Do one at a time, easy win

And they move to the right at the same time?

... and none of them goes in the same direction?

Remember you can press space to reset ;)
Or backspace to go back to main menu
There is an annoyingly straight forward soulution to this you know
Oo, but it goes to several locations!
Now to get to that last room
Try the same portals several times!
There is a pattern if you can figure it out
Careful not to go out again!
Two inside and one outside is the way to go!
Just be careful about the directions

Luckily the portal is a one-way portal!
You spin me round and round
Note that the edges will change your direction!
